name: Loot Goblin (NukedDev)
description:
Go, goblin, they may not want you to do it but it is your fate to roll the slots. Survive the assault of the demon casino and roll as many times as possible to make a great fortune!

Loot Goblin is an isometric action game where the main mechanic is rolling a slot machine, the more you roll, the more you earn but rolling too much in a short span of time and a little bad luck can easily be your undoing.

Submitted as an entry for my first game jam, the Juicy Jam. I did this project solo, I'm not an artist but so I tried my best in the given time frame, I created all 3D assets using blender. I am also not a sound designer but I borrowed some great royalty free sounds:

https://shapeforms.itch.io/shapeforms-audio-free-sfx
